question.text: The seemingly biased law of the Federation, the law that can only be inherited by male  relatives, actually has a certain factual basis. Because there is no female operator in all known IN mecha. There is a difference in physical quality between men and women, and no girl can withstand that kind of counterattack. The inherited military meritorious Lord refers to the resources vigorously cultivated by the country. The state will use countless money manpower to train those designated heirs. So girls who have never been able to do this are directly abandoned by the federal government.What do you think Ling Lan’s mother did to get the Inherited Lord of the Army?
